title: Can not lock in a ban / pick during champ select
body: I have a friend who very regularly can not "lock in" their pick or ban, resulting in them dodging without wanting to. This never happened to him on the old client, but I know his internet connection is also not that great, anyone know if this is a common issue or if its just him?

replies.body:
This sounds bad. Could you please ask him to share his logs with us? You can find how to do this [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq12). 

We're also introducing additional improvements to champ select with the upcoming 7.6 patch that should eliminate issues like this.
